attributes.action: Stop the plans for a Football stadium on country side green belt (Gamston, Nottingahmshire)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The City Council and Nottingahm Forest FC have conjured up a plan to build a massive football stadium on green belt land in the beautiful suburbs of Nottinghamshire. The current transport facilities are limited if not poor and there are virtually no facilities for the fans to congregate at.  Add to this the fact that the current road network in the area is already congested, this seems like poorly concived idea and  one destined for failure.

rejection.details: Please raise your concerns with your Council and Nottingahm Forest FC in the first instance.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
